A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was born in 1976\, have been a devoted fan my entire life\, and loved this installation in the saga. The fan backlash is mystifying to me. There are too many things to get in to in such a short space\, but the present and future owes nothing to the fans other than to make a great\, fun\, interesting movie that moves the ball forward. This movie does all that and more. It has some of the best use of effects I've ever witnessed\, the story makes complete sense to me\, and I was totally engrossed from start-to-finish. I plan to watch this many\, many times and can't wait to see where the trilogy ends up.
